data.persona: I am a snake. Snakes are not regarded as important in the realm. I kill rodents and chickens.
data.description:
You are in the Ruin of a house.
A run down wooden house buried in sand and dirt. The door is still on the house but the roof is collapsed on itself. Roots and vines cover most parts of the house.
There's a dirt, a clothes, a sand, a vine, a Root, and a tools here.
The rat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hide in clothes for warmth.
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to freeze to death if I don't find a warm place to spend the night.
data.long_motivation: I want to lay my eggs when spring comes.
